direct_low.description: Lowest direct price, key max price indicator
direct_low.method: Flag NaNs as is_direct_low_nan, impute in clean_data.py using listings and sales_history
direct_low.evaluation: NaNs preserved for clean_data.py imputation using listings price or recent sales_history sales_price.

low.method: Flag NaNs as is_low_nan, impute in clean_data.py using sales_history

lowest_list.method: Flag NaNs as is_lowest_list_nan, impute in clean_data.py using sales_history

sales_quantity.evaluation: No NaNs, suitable for raw granularity.

sales_price.evaluation: No NaNs, suitable for raw granularity.

price.method: Leave NaNs for missing days, flagged as is_missing_day
price.evaluation: NaNs preserved for missing days, to be handled in clean_data.py.

quantity.evaluation: No NaNs, indicates no inventory on missing days.

direct_inventory_count.evaluation: No NaNs, suitable for inventory tracking.

set_name.method: Fill NaNs with last known value per card_sku_id

rarity.method: Fill NaNs with last known value per card_sku_id

condition.method: Fill NaNs with last known value per card_sku_id

issues.description: clean_data.py error: 'card_sku_id' missing after outlier removal
listings table lacks explicit out-of-stock records (quantity == 0, direct_inventory_count == 0), indicating data unavailability
issues.resolution: Handled in merge_data.py with is_missing_day flag and zero imputation

issues.description: significant missing days in listings and market_prices (e.g., 2025-04-19 to 2025-04-22, 2025-05-05)
issues.resolution: Handled in merge_data.py with is_missing_day flag and zero imputation

issues.description: recurring TypeError: Object of type Timestamp is not JSON serializable in scratch files
high NaNs in sales_history post-merge (34.85% granular)
issues.resolution: Resolved in merge_data.py with date aggregation and zero-filling

issues.description: high outlier removal rate in sales_history (7.81% IQR 2.0, 4.93% IQR 3.0)
issues.resolution: Moved outlier handling to clean_data.py, flagging in merge_data.py

issues.description: pipeline.py failed due to missing pandas import
pipeline.py failed due to merge_data naming conflict
issues.resolution: Resolved by renaming argument to run_merge_data

issues.description: merge_data.py failed due to KeyError: None of [Index(['quantity', 'price'], dtype='object')] are in the [columns]
issues.resolution: Fixed by correcting sales_history column handling
Fixed by renaming sales_history columns during merge

notes: Project predicts maximum sales prices for Magic: The Gathering cards using TimescaleDB data (market_prices, sales_history, listings) and card_attributes.csv. Completed fetch_card_data, fetch_market_data, merge_data, and pipeline modules. fetch_market_data.py simplified listings query (removed price_rank <= 5, added is_low_inventory flag for direct_inventory_count <= 5). merge_data.py implements granular merge with a complete card_sku_id Ã— date grid, preserving direct_low/low/lowest_list NaNs, zero-filling listings quantity and direct_inventory_count, and merging sales_history at raw granularity. Latest run (2025-05-10T15:18:56) failed due to KeyError: 'quantity', fixed in merge_data.py. Drops card_sku_ids with no direct_low data across the entire date range, logged to logs/dropped_sku_ids_<timestamp>.txt. Added config/filters.json for dynamic thresholds (outliers, inventory, query filters). Flags for clean_data.py: is_direct_low_nan, is_missing_day, is_extreme_outlier, is_all_direct_low_nan, is_low_inventory, is_low_nan, is_lowest_list_nan, is_no_recent_sales. clean_data.py will impute direct_low using listings price (mean/median) or recent sales_history sales_price, handling cases where a sale causes dropshipper out-of-stock (e.g., listings at $10/$11, $10 sale, impute $11 for next day's direct_low NaN). Samples in merge_data_diagnostic_<timestamp>.json for NaNs and outliers. Next Steps: Develop clean_data.py to impute direct_low, validate outliers, and encode features. Optimize fetch_market_data.py for speed.
